Your midwife or doctor should:
• use a tape or undertake an ultrasound scan  
to measure the size of your uterus and plot 
on your individual growth chart;
• measure your blood pressure and test your 
urine for protein;
• offer	more	screening	tests;
• discuss	flu,	whooping	cough	and	COVID-19;
• discuss your
